h2_title: Where to Find the Tiger's Acolyte
h3_title: Tiger’s Acolyte Mini-Boss Fight and Guide
content: One leaping attack with a bit more warning will come when he jumps high into the air first, moving right above you before slamming down with his sword. The impact will be fierce, and even trying to use Rock Solid will simply send both of you stumbling back, so dodging is the better call here. It’s also a good idea to use Immobilize here, as there’s a good chance he’ll pull his sword out of the ground while performing a horizontal slash with incredible reach in a wide arc.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tiger's_Acolyte.md', within the main section titled 'Tiger's Acolyte', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Tiger's Acolyte' and the sub-subsection 'Tiger’s Acolyte Mini-Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
One leaping attack with a bit more warning will come when he jumps high into the air first, moving right above you before slamming down with his sword. The impact will be fierce, and even trying to use Rock Solid will simply send both of you stumbling back, so dodging is the better call here. It’s also a good idea to use Immobilize here, as there’s a good chance he’ll pull his sword out of the ground while performing a horizontal slash with incredible reach in a wide arc.
